name: HUNGRY ISLAND
description:
Welcome to HUNGRY ISLAND! 

Living in the LIFEVINE can be tough, and food is scarce -- but a strong current has brought a ripe SEEDLING bounty right to your island!

Shoot down and cultivate some of the yummiest SEEDZ to keep you satisfied! Keep an eye out, though, as you're not the only hungry one around!

Collect enough food to get you through the season!

Note: HUNGRY ISLAND is a full-screen 1920x1080 experience! Be prepared to dive in!
